page.title: 15The Mayor of Yeovil.
page.content: Joy Stanton,(now in her late forties) was born & brought up in Barnstable.She is married with 1 daughter & 2 grandchildren.On leaving school she spent 5 years in the R.A.F, and moved to Yeovil in 1962.She became mayor in 1983 & is now in her 3rd term of office,a record in Yeovil's history. She sits on 31 committees & likes being Mayor as she enjoys meeting people,but doesn't like the loss of her private life,(on one Sunday alone she got 41 phone calls).As mayor she receives a yearly allowance of Â£2000,& estimates she spends another Â£2000 of her own money in performing her duties. As a house wife Mrs. Stanton likes gardening,knitting & making clothes for her grand children,but is not so keen on housework.
